2022 RMAC All-Academic Football Team

2022 NFF Colorado Chapter Special Teams Player of the Year

2022 First-Team All-NFF Colorado Chapter All-Colorado Team (Special Teams)

2022 Second-Team All-NFF Colorado Chapter All-Colorado Team (Offense)

2022 Second-Team All-RMAC

2021 RMAC All-Academic Football Honor Roll

RMAC Special Teams Player of the Week (11/1/21)

2023 (R-Jr.): Played in and started all 11 games for the Pack at receiver … Caught 46 passes for 566 yards and averaged 12.3 yards per catch … Hauled in seven touchdown receptions, which was second-most on the team … Ranked 12th in Division II in punt returns as he averaged 11.9 yards per return and had one punt returned for a 70-yard touchdown against Western Colorado (9/16) … His eight touchdowns were third most on the team … Caught five or more passes in a game four times, including a career-high 11 receptions for 149 yards against Black Hills State (11/11) … Returned 18 punts for 215 yards … Also tallied 782 all-purpose yards, which was third on the team … Ranks second among active Division II players in career punt return touchdowns (2) and third among active Division II players in punt return average (16.4) … Sits sixth on the school’s all-time chart for pass receptions (108), seventh in career receiving yards (1,574) and second in career receiving touchdowns (20) … Earned Second-Team All-RMAC honors as a return specialist.

2022 (R-So.): Played in and started all 12 games for the Pack at receiver … Caught a single-season school record 12 touchdown passes … Second on team in pass receptions with 42 for 642 yards … Averaged 15.3 yards per reception and 53.3 receiving yards per game … Tallied at least two touchdown passes in three games, including a career-high four touchdown receptions against Chadron State (10/22) … Ranked 11th in NCAA Division II with 12 touchdown receptions … Had three games with 100 or more receiving yards … Was third in Division II in yards per punt return as he averaged 17.4 yards per return … Returned 18 punts for 313 yards … Earned First-Team All-RMAC honors and was the NFF Colorado Chapter’s Special Team Player of the Year.

2021 (R-Fr.): Emerged as a spark plug at the wide receiver position ... Made third-most receptions on team (20) and racked up the third-most receiving yards (366) ... Averaged 18.30 yards per reception ... Logged first career touchdown at South Dakota Mines ... Tallied season-high 102 yards on three receptions at South Dakota Mines ... Caught season-long 90-yard touchdown at Western Colorado ... Scored 73-yard punt return touchdown at Fort Lewis College ... Led team with 245 yards off punt returns and one touchdown off 11 attempts ... Named Special Teams Player of the Week (11/1) following performance at Fort Lewis College.

2020 (R-Fr.): No Season Due to COVID-19 Pandemic.

2019 (RS): Redshirted.

Ironwood Ridge HS: Posted 2,869 all-purpose yards, 1,301 receiving yards and recorded 23 touchdowns … Is a two-time all-region selection at WR/KR … Earned Player of the Week honors.

Personal: Born October 19 … Son of Jason and Julie Cook … Has one brother, Dylan … Economics major.

Career Highs:

Receptions: 11 vs. Black Hills State, 11/11/23

Receiving Yards: 159 (2x) last vs. Black Hills State, 11/11/23

Touchdown Receptions: 4 vs. Chadron State, 10/22/22

Longest Reception: 90 yards at Western Colorado, 11/13/21

Punt Returns: 4 (3x) last at Chadron State, 10/21/23

Punt Return Yards: 114 vs. Fort Lewis, 10/1/22

Longest Punt Return: 73 yards at Fort Lewis, 10/30/21

School Records:

Single-season Touchdown Receptions: 12 (2022)
